    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    DataAccessInterface<T>
    Generic interface for data access operations
    LoginController
    Controller handling user login functionality
    LoginModel
    Model class representing login form data
    LoginService
    Service class for handling user login operations
    MainController
    Controller for main application pages Handles routing for home, dashboard, and inventory pages
    MilestoneApplication
    Main Spring Boot application class Initializes and runs the application
    OrderModel
    Model class representing an order in the system
    ProductController
     
    ProductDAO
    Data Access Object interface for Product operations
    ProductDAOImpl
    DAO for product model CRUD operations for products in db
    ProductMapper
    Maps database rows to ProductModel objects
    ProductModel
    product model for books
    ProductService
     
    RegistrationController
    user register
    RegistrationModel
    registration model for new users
    RegistrationService
    Service Layer - handles registration-related operations
    SecurityTestController
     
    UserDAO
    Data Access Object interface for User operations
    UserDAOImpl
    UserDAOImpl
    UserDetailsServiceImpl
    Custom implementation of Spring Security's UserDetailsService
    UserMapper
    Maps database rows to RegistrationModel objects
    UserRepository
    Repository interface for User entity operations Provides CRUD operations for the RegistrationModel entity
    WebSecurityConfig
    Configuration class for web security settings
